meanings.sent1: The antimitotic medication slowed down the growth of cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Doctors prescribed an antimitotic drug to stop the cells from dividing rapidly.
meanings.sent3: The antimitotic treatment made the cells so lazy, they refused to split.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an antimitotic force, halting any distractions from her goal.
meanings.sent5: The antimitotic effect was like a shield, protecting the cells from multiplying uncontrollably.

meanings.definition: A substance that inhibits or prevents cell division
meanings.sent1: The scientist discovered a new antimitotic in the plant extract.
meanings.sent2: Pharmaceutical companies are researching different antimitotics for cancer treatment.
meanings.sent3: The antimitotic was like a superhero, saving the cells from division villains.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against cancer, antimitotics act as warriors, fighting against uncontrolled cell growth.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of the antimitotic was a breakthrough in the field of medicine.
